createPresentationDescription1: The current application is in beta version. You can use AI to transform your creative ideas into displayable Slides.
createPresentationDescription2: If you are not satisfied with the in-built templates and official templates, you may also choose to use AI to generate your custom templates.
createPresentationDescription3: More features will be supported soon, so please stay tuned.
extraInfoAboutDocument: It might take a few minutes for large documents.
promptInputHint: Provide specific details about your presentation needs (e.g., topic, style, key points) for more accurate results
onlyPdfTxtPptxDocxAllowed: Please upload only PDF, TXT, PPTX, or DOCX files
multiplePdfNotAllowed: Multiple PDF files are not allowed
selectOnlyOnePdf: Please select only one PDF file
supportedTypes: Supports PDFs, Text files, PPTX, DOCX
dragDropOrClickToUpload: Drag and drop your file here or click below button
toneDescription: Controls the writing style (e.g., casual, professional, funny).
verbosityDescription: Controls how detailed slide descriptions are: concise, standard, or text-heavy.
includeTableOfContentsDescription: Add an index slide summarizing sections (requires 3+ slides).
includeTitleSlideDescription: Include a title slide as the first slide.
webSearchDescription: Allow the model to consult the web for fresher facts.
instructionsDescription: Optional guidance for the AI. These override defaults except format constraints.
instructionsExample: Example: Focus on enterprise buyers, emphasize ROI and security compliance. Keep slides data-driven, avoid jargon, and include a short call-to-action on the final slide.
